test.label: Urdu - long 2

test.label: reh-small-tah + yeh
test.comment: Collisions between a final and initial (with no space) are handled by kerning, not shifting.

test.comment: Keep the isolate waw from overlapping much.

test.label: pa + k (Malachi - 6)
test.comment: Expects the alef to be closer to the kaf. Sheldon says: The vertical part of the kaf and the alef should be spaced as two alefs or an ale lam would.

test.label: full stop (Malachi - 7)
test.comment: Keep the full stop from overlapping.

test.comment: Need more space before the second word.

test.label: reh + jeem
test.string: پر چی ر چی پد چی پو چی

test.label: reh + nuqta
test.comment: heh-do -> seen

test.label: peh + waw + peh
test.comment: removed initial kaf

test.label: alef + beh + chotiyeh + jeem + chotiyeh
test.comment: Urdu

test.label: yeh + final tcheh
test.comment: Why is the triple-nuqta moved down far enough to create a collision? Is that because the tcheh is jumpable?

test.label: lam + theh + theh + kaf
test.comment: The left side of the lam is keeping the triple-nuqta from moving.

test.label: alef-madda + kaf
test.comment: heh-do -> seen

test.label: alef + lam + ghain
test.comment: ain -> khah

test.label: alef + takhalus + kaf
test.comment: heh-goal -> seen

test.label: ref + ... + ain-final
test.comment: ain -> jeem

test.label: alef + peh + yeh
test.comment: Why doesn't it just move the triple-nuqta right and then kern?

test.label: theh + waw + teh
test.comment: The kerning is done too late to let the triple-nuqta move to the left.

test.label: noon + noon + gaf
test.comment: Why is the nuqta jumping the gaf?

test.label: gaf + teh + hamza-waw
test.comment: Why doesn't it move the double-nuqta up? BECAUSE it thinks it can't cross the gaf. Argghh!

test.label: alef + noon + takhalus + teh
test.comment: Why is the takhalus not moving? It sets flags to 3 instead of 2.

test.label: lots of fun
test.comment: Same problem - the zabar is being marked FIX+IGNORE.

test.label: alef-madda tey
test.comment: The adjustment is so small you can't really see it.

test.label: zabar + 2nuqta
test.comment: meem -> seen

test.label: sheen + sheen + teh
test.comment: The offset between the second triple-nuqta and the double-nuqta is not what I would expect from minxoffset = 150m.

test.label: alef + beh + chotiyeh
test.comment: The ordering of the nuqtas does not seem to reflect maxoverlap.

test.label: beh + yeh + jeem
test.comment: The centers of the first single-nuqta and the double-nuqta does not reflect minxoffset.

test.label: teh + hamza-waw
test.comment: The double-nuqta is centered over the hamza - it should be further to the right.

test.label: zair + following chotiyeh
test.comment: Is it a problem that the zair is not to the right of the following nuqta?

test.label: alef + teh + kaf
test.comment: Should be easy to fix.

test.label: teh + khah + kaf
test.comment: For the double-nuqta, max.x = 500m which should be enough to move it away from the top of the kaf.

test.label: teh + jeem + kaf
test.comment: This is a tricky in Nafees, but not so much in Awami.

test.label: gaf + zabar
test.comment: Can't move the zabar far enough to the right to solve the problem.

test.label: khah + noon + gaf
test.comment: No good solution.

test.label: why is this a problem?
test.comment: Broken because the exclude glyph keeps the feh nuqta from moving north-east.

test.comment: real words

test.label: beh + yeh-F (Eunice)
test.comment: She thinks the dot is too high; should be the same as the peh+waw.

test.label: peh + waw (Eunice)
test.comment: This looks okay to me, better than in her PDF.

test.label: aalim (Eunice)
test.comment: Where *should* the zair go? Isn't putting it under the meem confusing?

test.label: swad (Eunice)
test.comment: Dot is too far to the right.

test.label: laqkha (Eunice)
test.comment: Bad nuqta positioning.

test.label: toothless seen not distinct
test.comment: Eunice; confused with jeh?

test.label: seen + meem
test.comment: Eunice

test.label: jeem + meem
test.comment: Dieter

test.label: jeem
test.comment: Dieter

test.label: noon nuqta
test.comment: Eunice: nuqta is too far to the right on beM2 form.

test.label: kaf + alef
test.comment: Vertical stems should be more consistent and parallel.

test.label: alt meem
test.comment: Initial alt meem should be more of a blob; too curved an entrance into the alef.

test.label: reh dal waw
test.comment: Final dal and isolate reh are very similar. Top of dal starts further to the right. Head of waw is too heavy; shrink head but keep the same height.
test.string: ر د و یر ید یو

test.label: dal vs. reh
test.comment: Reh corner should be more curved; both should be wider. These shapes should be almost identical. Bottom should be more flat, like the reh.

test.label: reh
test.comment: More of an S shape to the first group of rehs. For second group, less like steps and more flowy.
test.string: عر لھز سظݱ سنڙ جر کڗ سلژ

test.label: isolate dah shapes
test.string: دَ دِ ذ ڊ ڐ ڈ ڋ ݙ

test.label: kaf + reh
test.comment: Needs to be more flowy, more vertical space between kaf and reh.

test.label: tahs
test.comment: Make left sides more consistent. Final is the more standard form. Get rid of open left sides. Make vertical stroke better.

test.label: final alef
test.comment: Isolate alef is maybe too tall; final alef seems too short after kaf and gaf.

test.label: yeh w/ hamza
test.comment: Hamza should be bigger.

test.label: initial jeems (more)
test.comment: Some are still too narrow. Send Sheldon a sketch and get him to draw them.
test.string: خن خہ خہر خس خق خر خو خبر

test.label: pesh shape
test.comment: Should it look more like a waw?

test.label: tah + diacritic
test.string: طَ بطُ طُل ظَ سظُ ظّے

test.label: bariyeh
test.comment: Barieyeh should be flatter and entrance should be more angled.

test.label: sad + meem
test.comment: Noori and Noto both have the sad much higher than the meem.

test.label: feh, qaf, waw heads
test.comment: Less saggy bottom on isolate waw and initial feh.

test.label: heh-goal hook shape
test.comment: Hook should be a little bigger and a different angle. Should be more of a blob

test.label: noon + meem
test.comment: Right edge of beh form should not have an upward flare. However, apparently it should be different from absBehIni.mmM

test.label: name marker
test.comment: Posiitioning needs attention. V-part is larger; left-most stroke is basically flat.

test.label: gaf strokes
test.comment: Top of strokes should be more even. Maybe okay for now.

test.label: kaf vs. keheh
test.comment: Noori renders both with no squiggle. Is the difference hekpful to recognize different characters?

test.label: small mark upper APs
test.comment: Drop by 1/3 of the distance.

test.label: beh + noon/qaf
test.comment: Beh nuqta should be lowered just before final qaf and noon. Not lam. Sheldon needs to research this more.

test.label: jeem + yeh
test.comment: Should nuqta be lower?

test.label: alef madda
test.comment: Madda is too heavy

test.label: feh nuqta
test.comment: Line height rule is pushing one of the nuqtas down.

test.label: final & isolate kaf
test.comment: They should both use the wider wdith.

test.label: dad nuqtas
test.comment: Nuqtas are too high.

test.label: ghain nuqta
test.comment: Move nuqta more directly above head.

test.label: aim + tah
test.comment: Inconsistencies. Make exit of ain a little thicker, like .sd form.

test.label: beh + heh-do
test.comment:
Beh nuqta is too close to heh-doachashmee. Move it down.
Is absBehIni.hd too thick at right edge?

test.label: beh + kaf + alef
test.comment: Beh form a tiny bit shorter and tighter in - but only before the kaf/gaf.

test.label: beh + lam + meem
test.comment: Loosen lam connection. Make more like kaf.

test.label: beF forms
test.comment: Smooth off beF forms.

test.label: jeem + jeem
test.comment: First nuqta should be higher.

test.label: beh + kaf + yeh - bug
test.comment: collision!

test.label: vertical stroke sample

test.comment: Substitute a wider beh form.

test.comment: Substitute a wider beh form.

test.label: nuqta + vowel-small-V + kaf/gaf
test.comment: Substitute a wider beh form.

test.label: noon-small-V + gaf
test.comment: Use smaller nuqta and lower V

test.label: khah + teh/theh + alef/lam
test.comment: Substitute wider jeem.

test.label: kaf + ring + beh.hgF [rule 66]
test.comment: obsolete case

test.label: beh + yeh + jeem
test.comment: Use an alternate AP, nLowerTight, for the middle nuqta.

test.label: beh + beh + jeem
test.comment: Use an alternate AP, nLowerTight, for the middle nuqta.

test.label: switched nuqtas
test.string: قبیح قیبح قبپح قپبح قپیح قیپح قٻیح قیٻح قڹیح قیڹح

test.label: beh + kaf/lam + heh-doachashmee [rule 21-23]
test.comment: Move nuqtas down and to the right.

test.label: noon/teh + feh
test.comment: Turn off sequencing so noon/teh nuqta is lower.

test.label: jeem + noon/teh/sheen [rule 40]
test.comment: Don't allow nuqta to move as far right.

test.label: jeem + teh + alef/lam/kaf [rule 10]
test.comment: Shift nuqtas down into the space - not essential.

test.label: hah + teh + alef/lam/kaf [rule 14-18]
test.comment: Prevent nuqtas from popping up to the top of the alef/lam.

test.label: alef-madda + kaf
test.comment: Use tall kaf so alef-madda can squeeze in; also adjust kerning.

test.label: diac + jeem + diac + kaf
test.comment: The jeem is narrow so even a single nuqta requires a taller kaf.

test.label: really tall word
test.comment: Even the short forms don't quite deal with this one.

test.label: reh/dal + yeh [rule 3]
test.comment: Shift nuqtas down so bases can stay together.

test.label: dal + yeh + waw [rule 2-3]
test.comment: Shift nuqtas down so bases can stay together.

test.label: waw + beh + waw [rule 3]
test.comment: Shift nuqtas down so bases can stay together.

test.label: dal + peh + waw
test.comment: Shift nuqtas down so bases can stay together.

test.label: alef + yeh + meem [rule 12]
test.comment: Shift nuqtas down so alef can stay close to beh.

test.label: gaf + upper-diac + gaf [rule 13]
test.comment: Move diacritic to the right; there is no good place for it.

test.label: reh + qaf + reh
test.comment: kerning

test.label: ain + zain + yeh + reh [rule 7, 108]
test.comment: Shift nuqtas up and right to avoid reh tail; also use a smaller margin for reh.

test.label: lam/kaf + meem + upper
test.comment: Move diac to the left.

test.label: tarixi - reh + yeh + jeem
test.comment: Move nuqtas up under beh form to avoid sitting on top of reh; don't allow reh to kern underneath.

test.label: isolate alef [rule 569]
test.comment: Set isolate alef and kaf a set distance apart; don't use auto-kerning.

test.label: alef (isolate) + kaf [rule 569]
test.comment: Set alef and kaf a set distance apart; don't use auto-kerning.

test.label: alef (final) + kaf [rule 569]
test.comment: Set alef and kaf a set distance apart; don't use auto-kerning.

test.comment: Dieter: if the waw wanders under the shin (a nice feature), then I would like to see the re and waw closer together.

test.comment: Add some kerning.
